name: GreeceQuake
description:
An earthquake is coming, and you should prepare for it... by building a tall, unstable tower, of course!

You get points based on your character's final height above the ground. Place Player and press Start to start the earthquake.

Tip: press E and Q to rotate building blocks.

The code, music and visuals are made in one week for LÖVE Jam 2022

Source code: GitHub
